dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Twitter
dmca.body:
no_username, Jul-06 02:49 am (PDT):

Tell us about yourself: I am the copyright owner.
Your full name: [redacted]
Job title: Owner Art bussines

Email address: [redacted]
Street address: [redacted]
City: Goes
State/Province: Zeeland
Postal code: 4461 PS
Country: Netherlands
Phone number(optional): [REDACTED]
Fax number(optional): n/a

Description of original work: Original artworks : girl one big eye, two ponytails and the name noefy.
Shown also on localbuissines see noefyfacebook

Reported Twitter account: pluckvaz
Description of Infringement: This owner of the twitteraccount "twitter @pluckvaz noefy [REDACTED]" uses my official registred trademark businesslogo.



It's not allowed to use my official Noefy businesslogo without my permission and i've not given permission to use it in any kind.

Twitterfolowers can be easily mistaken by the logo that "pluckvaz noefy [REDACTED]" uses. I don't have a problem with his account, only with the image/logo he uses.

If possibble I want you to let "pluckvaz noefy [REDACTED]" remove my logo and force him/her to take another image.


Regards,
[REDACTED]
Type of infringing material: Background image
Type of infringing material: Avatar (profile picture)
Type of infringing material: n/a
512(f) Acknowledgment: I understand that under 17 U.S.C. Â§ 512(f), I may be liable for any damages, including costs and attorneys' fees, if I knowingly materially misrepresent that reported material or activity is infringing.

Good Faith Belief: I have good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

Authority to Act: n/a

Signature: [redacted]
